info.name: Apache Detection
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some Apache servers have the version on the response header. The OpenSSL version can be also obtained

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: unif.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: DOM EventListener - Cross-Site Scripting
author: yavolo
dwisiswant0
info.description: EventListener contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability via the document object model (DOM). An attacker can execute arbitrary script which can then allow theft of cookie-based authentication credentials and launch of  other attacks.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: unif.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: Deprecated TLS Detection (TLS 1.1 or SSLv3)
author: righettod
forgedhallpass
info.description: Both TLS 1.1 and SSLv3 are deprecated in favor of stronger encryption.
info.remediation: Update the web server's TLS configuration to disable TLS 1.1 and SSLv3.

info.name: Deprecated TLS Detection (TLS 1.1 or SSLv3)
author: righettod
forgedhallpass
info.description: Both TLS 1.1 and SSLv3 are deprecated in favor of stronger encryption.
info.remediation: Update the web server's TLS configuration to disable TLS 1.1 and SSLv3.

info.name: Microsoft Azure - Domain Tenant ID
author: v0idc0de
info.description: Checks if the domain is part of an Azure tenant and finds the ID using Azure's OpenID discovery page.

request:
GET /unif.fr/v2.0/.well-known/openid-configuration HTTP/1.1
Host: login.microsoftonline.com
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Length: 1753
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, OPTIONS
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Cache-Control: max-age=86400, private
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Date: Sun, 02 Oct 2022 02:06:54 GMT
P3p: CP="DSP CUR OTPi IND OTRi ONL FIN"
Set-Cookie: fpc=AjmF-onGzDRHjkKX4CQcEss; expires=Tue, 01-Nov-2022 02:06:55 GMT; path=/; secure; HttpOnly; SameSite=None
Set-Cookie: esctx=AQABAAAAAAD--DLA3VO7QrddgJg7Wevrlv5JGnh6IzWNvPRqv8ccPbqc1C311lWgP2r4eQCK-l9yAnYyeDzHPeI_Qd6z_S_Ar5MAq3y7XMm3UvhguVG5LscyVrMkWuCbEdNVhSQHXEbmwdmY9NJSehnFUztwE2r3XsBAZA6yP9gRlufWA_59nK7VKbFwTRJGDQi4DMIllaSeAaIi6GSrYGXw1z-nYB_tUZALHoh-Shb1AqN0Zi7WrtMGfZjW2AORfuKBKAuXiKUgAA; domain=.login.microsoftonline.com; path=/; secure; HttpOnly; SameSite=None
Set-Cookie: x-ms-gateway-slice=estsfd; path=/; secure; samesite=none; httponly
Set-Cookie: stsservicecookie=estsfd; path=/; secure; samesite=none; httponly
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Ms-Ests-Server: 2.1.13777.5 - NEULR1 ProdSlices
X-Ms-Request-Id: 70e18728-30ec-49e7-9f62-ceae3d3e1000
X-Xss-Protection: 0

{"token_endpoint":"https://login.microsoftonline.com/ed272233-272d-44eb-a1de-d5e6192a67d3/oauth2/v2.0/token","token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported":["client_secret_post","private_key_jwt","client_secret_basic"],"jwks_uri":"https://login.microsoftonline.com/ed272233-272d-44eb-a1de-d5e6192a67d3/discovery/v2.0/keys","response_modes_supported":["query","fragment","form_post"],"subject_types_supported":["pairwise"],"id_token_signing_alg_values_supported":["RS256"],"response_types_supported":["code","id_token","code id_token","id_token token"],"scopes_supported":["openid","profile","email","offline_access"],"issuer":"https://login.microsoftonline.com/ed272233-272d-44eb-a1de-d5e6192a67d3/v2.0","request_uri_parameter_supported":false,"userinfo_endpoint":"https://graph.microsoft.com/oidc/userinfo","authorization_endpoint":"https://login.microsoftonline.com/ed272233-272d-44eb-a1de-d5e6192a67d3/oauth2/v2.0/authorize","device_authorization_endpoint":"https://login.microsoftonline.com/ed272233-272d-44eb-a1de-d5e6192a67d3/oauth2/v2.0/devicecode","http_logout_supported":true,"frontchannel_logout_supported":true,"end_session_endpoint":"https://login.microsoftonline.com/ed272233-272d-44eb-a1de-d5e6192a67d3/oauth2/v2.0/logout","claims_supported":["sub","iss","cloud_instance_name","cloud_instance_host_name","cloud_graph_host_name","msgraph_host","aud","exp","iat","auth_time","acr","nonce","preferred_username","name","tid","ver","at_hash","c_hash","email"],"kerberos_endpoint":"https://login.microsoftonline.com/ed272233-272d-44eb-a1de-d5e6192a67d3/kerberos","tenant_region_scope":"EU","cloud_instance_name":"microsoftonline.com","cloud_graph_host_name":"graph.windows.net","msgraph_host":"graph.microsoft.com","rbac_url":"https://pas.windows.net"}

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22910
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;unif.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22910
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 5, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;unif.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	5 ALT1.ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	5 ALT2.ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	10 ALT4.ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	1 ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
unif.fr.	10800	IN	MX	10 ALT3.ASPMX.L.GOOGLE.COM.
